meanings.definition: A type of tree native to New Zealand with bright yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The kowhai tree in the park is tall and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: I love the vibrant color of the kowhai flowers.
meanings.sent3: The kowhai tree waved its branches in the wind, as if saying hello.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the kowhai tree, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The kowhai tree stood out among the greenery, a beacon of yellow.

meanings.definition: The bright yellow flowers of the kowhai tree.
meanings.sent1: We gathered under the kowhai to enjoy its blossoms.
meanings.sent2: The kowhai flowers attract many bees with their sweet nectar.
meanings.sent3: The kowhai blooms seemed to be smiling at the sun above.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as yellow as the kowhai flowers in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The kowhai blossoms danced in the breeze, a golden shower of petals.
